trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Multi-hop VPN routes your traffic through two servers instead of one for extra security and privacy. Your browsing experience will be affected by your “exit” server location.
trans-unit.target: Une VPN a salt multipli al indrece il to trafic su doi servidôrs al puest di un sôl, par vê plui sigurece e riservatece. La tô esperience di navigazion e vignarà influençade de posizion là che si cjate il tô servidôr di “jessude”.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: There’s a small trade-off for this extra security — this may also slow down your connection a bit. You can reduce this effect by choosing servers that are both close to each other as well as to your own location.
trans-unit.target: Cheste sigurece in plui e à bisugne di un compromès — al è pussibil che la conession e vegni un pôc morestade. Tu puedis ridusi chest efiet sielzint servidôrs che a son dongje tra di lôr e dongje ae tô posizion.
Ce ise la VPN a salt multipli?
